data.name: Evil Eye Confrontation
data.desc: If you control an "Evil Eye" monster: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, and "Evil Eye of Selene" is in your Spell & Trap Zone, banish that destroyed card. You can only activate 1 "Evil Eye Confrontation" per turn.

card_sets.set_name: 2020 Tin of Lost Memories Mega Pack
